parameters.name: recordtypejsonraw
parameters.query:
let rawObject = dynamic({jsonObject});
let inputRecordId = iff(isnull(rawObject.recordId), "", tostring(rawObject.recordId));

let actualResult = traces
    | extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
    | extend 
        subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
        recordId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
        additionalInfo = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.additional_info"]))
    | where recordId == inputRecordId
    | where subscenario == "Intake"
    | extend entityLogicalName = tostring(additionalInfo["entitylogicalname"])
    | where isnotempty(entityLogicalName)   
    | extend result = pack("entityLogicalName", entityLogicalName), source = 1
    | project result, source
    | take 1;

let fallback = datatable(result: dynamic, source: long) [dynamic({"entityLogicalName": ""}),0];

union actualResult, fallback
| sort by source desc
| take 1
| project result;

parameters.name: agentNameJson
parameters.query:
traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"])
| extend orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where subscenario == "AgentNameConfig"
| extend agentDataRaw = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.data"])
| extend agentData = parse_json(agentDataRaw)
| mv-expand key = bag_keys(agentData)
| project id = tostring(key), name = tostring(agentData[tostring(key)])
| summarize agentNameJson = make_bag(pack(id, name))
| project agentNameJson

traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])

parameters.name: queueNameDropdown
parameters.label: Queue
parameters.query:
let orgIdFromDropDown = dynamic([{orgDropdown}]);

let tracesParsed = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    message = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.message"]),
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where orgId in (orgIdFromDropDown);

let routeToQueueEvents = tracesParsed
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue", "TransferToQueue")
| extend 
    rawDescription = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"]),
    rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
| extend  
    queueId = case(
        subscenario == "TransferToQueue", extract(@"QueueId: ([0-9a-fA-F-]{36})", 1, rawDescription),
        subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue"), tostring(resultJson.Id),
        ""
    ),
    queueName = case(
        subscenario == "TransferToQueue", extract(@"Target Queue: (.+?) with QueueId", 1, rawDescription),
        subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue"), tostring(resultJson.DisplayName),
        ""
    )
| where queueName != ""
| distinct queueId, queueName;

routeToQueueEvents

content.query:
let _screen = "{screen}";
let orgIdFromDropDown = dynamic([{orgDropdown}]);
let channelFilter = dynamic([{channelDropdown}]); 
let queueFilter = dynamic([{queueNameDropdown}]); 

// Step 1: Parse traces once
let parsedTracesTable = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"]),
    parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| where orgId in (orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend  
    channel = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.StreamSource),
        isnotnull(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]), tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]),
        ""),
    queueId = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId),
        "")
| where isnotempty(conversationId) and isnotnull(orgId);

// Step 2: Extract channel from ConversationCreated traces
let conversationCreatedChannels = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| extend createdChannel = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"])
| where createdChannel in (channelFilter)
| project conversationId;

// Step 3: Get queueId from latest CSRAssignment
let csrAssignmentQueue = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "CSRAssignment"
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend queueIdTracesParsed = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdTracesParsed) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdTracesParsed;

// Step 4: Get queueId from latest RouteToQueue or RTQ (exclude TransferToQueue)
let routeToQueueEvents = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue")
| extend 
    rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend
     resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
 | extend   queueIdRTQ = tostring(resultJson.Id)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdRTQ) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdRTQ;

// Step 5: Combine queueId sources, preferring CSRAssignment
let finalQueueIds = csrAssignmentQueue
| union (routeToQueueEvents
         | where conversationId !in (csrAssignmentQueue));
// Step 6: Filter conversations based on channel and queue filters
let filteredConversations = finalQueueIds
| where conversationId in (conversationCreatedChannels)
| where queueId in (queueFilter)
| project conversationId;

let filteredTraces = parsedTracesTable
| where conversationId in (filteredConversations);

let assignmentSubscenarios = dynamic(["CSRAssignment", "ManualAssignment", "TransferAssignment"]);


let tracesParsed = filteredTraces
| summarize by timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, tostring(customDimensions)
| project timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, customDim = parse_json(customDimensions);

// --- New: Closed conversations
let closedConversations = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "ConversationClosed"
| summarize by conversationId;

let ConversationCreateds = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| summarize ConversationCreatedTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;

let botEscalationToHuman = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CopilotAgentEscalationToCSR"
| summarize botEscalateToHumanTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;

let firstCSRAccepted = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CSRAccepted"
| where tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"]) contains "request completed"
| summarize firstCSRAcceptedTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;

// --- Get queueName from routing events
let queues = tracesParsed
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue", "TransferToQueue")
| extend rawDescription = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"])
| extend rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
| extend queueId = case(
    subscenario == "TransferToQueue", extract(@"QueueId: ([0-9a-fA-F-]{36})", 1, rawDescription),
    subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue"), tostring(resultJson.Id),
    "")
| extend queueName = case(
    subscenario == "TransferToQueue", extract(@"Target Queue: (.+?) with QueueId", 1, rawDescription),
    subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue"), tostring(resultJson.DisplayName),
    "")
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueName) by queueId;

// --- Get most recent queueId from CSRAssignment
let csrAssignmentQueue1  = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CSRAssignment"
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend queueIdTracesParsed = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdTracesParsed) by conversationId;

// Step 4: Get queueId from latest RouteToQueue or RTQ (exclude TransferToQueue)
let routeToQueueEvents1 = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue")
| extend 
    rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend
     resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
 | extend   queueIdRTQ = tostring(resultJson.Id)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdRTQ) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueIdTracesParsed = queueIdRTQ;

// Step 5: Combine queueId sources, preferring CSRAssignment
let recentQueueIdForConversation = csrAssignmentQueue1
| union (routeToQueueEvents1
         | where conversationId !in (csrAssignmentQueue1));
         

let assignmentStats = tracesParsed
| where subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios)
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend wokstreamId = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.WorkStreamId)
| summarize assignmentCount = count(), initiated = min(timestamp), wokstreamId = any(wokstreamId) by conversationId;

// Updated conversationState with Closed override
let conversationStateRaw  = tracesParsed
| extend type = customDim["type"]
| extend currentState = customDim["omnichannel.new_state"]
| extend previousState = customDim["omnichannel.previous_state"]
| where type == "C1ActionsDiagnosticsEvent"
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by conversationId
| project conversationId, currentState, previousState;

let conversationState = conversationStateRaw
| extend currentState = iff(conversationId in (closedConversations), "Closed", currentState);


let conversationStatus = ConversationCreateds
| join kind = leftouter (botEscalationToHuman) on conversationId
| join kind = leftouter (firstCSRAccepted) on conversationId
| extend assignmentDurationStart = iff(isnotempty(botEscalateToHumanTime), botEscalateToHumanTime, ConversationCreatedTime)
| project conversationId, ConversationCreatedTime, botEscalateToHumanTime, assignmentDurationStart, firstCSRAcceptedTime
| join kind=leftouter (assignmentStats) on conversationId
| join kind=leftouter (recentQueueIdForConversation) on conversationId
| extend finalQueueId = queueIdTracesParsed
| join kind = leftouter (queues) on $left.finalQueueId == $right.queueId
| extend duration = tolong((firstCSRAcceptedTime - assignmentDurationStart ) / 1s)
| join kind = leftouter (conversationState) on conversationId
| extend jsonObject = pack("conversationId", conversationId, "queue", queueName, "previousScreen", _screen, "assignmentDuration", duration, "currentState", currentState)
| sort by initiated desc
| project 
    ["ConversationID"] = conversationId,
    ["Conversation Status"] = iff(isnotempty(currentState), currentState, "Open"),
    ["Initiated"] = ConversationCreatedTime;

// Cumulative Logic
let makeCumsum = (status: string) {
    conversationStatus
    | where ["Conversation Status"] == status
    | sort by ["Initiated"] asc
    | summarize conversationCount = count() by binTime = bin(["Initiated"], 1h), ["Conversation Status"]
    | sort by binTime asc
    | serialize
    | extend CumulativeCount = row_cumsum(conversationCount)
    | project conversationCount, ["Conversation Status"], binTime, CumulativeCount
};

let cumsumOpenStatus = makeCumsum("Open");
let cumsumActiveStatus = makeCumsum("Active");
let cumsumWrapupStatus = makeCumsum("WrapUp");
let cumsumClosedStatus = makeCumsum("Closed");
let cumsumWaitingStatus = makeCumsum("Waiting");

union cumsumOpenStatus, cumsumActiveStatus, cumsumWrapupStatus, cumsumClosedStatus, cumsumWaitingStatus
| where binTime {chartTimeRange};

let orgIdFromDropDown = dynamic([{orgDropdown}]);
let channelFilter = dynamic([{channelDropdown}]); // Can be a parameter
let queueFilter = dynamic([{queueNameDropdown}]); // Can be a parameter

let assignmentEvents = dynamic([
    "CSRAssignment",
    "CSRAssignment",
    "ManualAssignment",
    "TransferAssignment",
    "CSRAssignment"
]);
// Step 1: Parse traces once
let parsedTracesTable = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"]),
    parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| where orgId in (orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend  
    channel = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.StreamSource),
        isnotnull(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]), tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]),
        ""),
    queueId = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId),
        "")
| where isnotempty(conversationId) and isnotnull(orgId);

// Step 2: Extract channel from ConversationCreated traces
let conversationCreatedChannels = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| extend createdChannel = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"])
| where createdChannel in (channelFilter)
| project conversationId;

// Step 3: Get queueId from latest CSRAssignment
let csrAssignmentQueue = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "CSRAssignment"
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend queueIdTracesParsed = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdTracesParsed) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdTracesParsed;

// Step 4: Get queueId from latest RouteToQueue or RTQ (exclude TransferToQueue)
let routeToQueueEvents = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue")
| extend 
    rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend
     resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
 | extend   queueIdRTQ = tostring(resultJson.Id)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdRTQ) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdRTQ;

// Step 5: Combine queueId sources, preferring CSRAssignment
let finalQueueIds = csrAssignmentQueue
| union (routeToQueueEvents
         | where conversationId !in (csrAssignmentQueue));
         
// Step 6: Filter conversations based on channel and queue filters
let filteredConversations = finalQueueIds
| where conversationId in (conversationCreatedChannels)
| where queueId in (queueFilter)
| project conversationId;

let filteredTraces = parsedTracesTable
| where conversationId in (filteredConversations);


// Step 7: Continue with durations

// Bot-involved durations
let botDurations = filteredTraces
    | where subscenario == "CopilotAgentEscalationToCSR"
    | summarize botTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId
    | join kind=inner (
        filteredTraces
        | where subscenario == "CSRAccepted"
        | summarize CSRAcceptedTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId
    ) on conversationId
    | where CSRAcceptedTime > botTime
    | project conversationId, duration = datetime_diff("second", CSRAcceptedTime, botTime);

// Non-bot durations
let nonBotDurations = filteredTraces
    | summarize hasBot = any(subscenario == "CopilotAgentEscalationToCSR") by conversationId
    | where hasBot == false
    | join kind=inner (
        filteredTraces
        | where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
        | summarize createTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId
    ) on conversationId
    | join kind=inner (
        filteredTraces
        | where subscenario == "CSRAccepted"
        | summarize CSRAcceptedTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId
    ) on conversationId
    | where CSRAcceptedTime > createTime
    | project conversationId, duration = datetime_diff("second", CSRAcceptedTime, createTime);

// Combine durations and compute 95th percentile
let combinedDurations = union botDurations, nonBotDurations
    | project duration;

let duration = combinedDurations
| summarize value = iif(count() > 0, percentile(duration, 95), 0)
| extend label = "Assignment time", suffix = "sec", subtitle = "(P95)";

// Total processed conversations with assignments
let totalProcessedConv = filteredTraces
    | where subscenario in (assignmentEvents)
    | summarize label = "Total processed conversation", value = dcount(conversationId), subtitle = "(Assigned atleast once)";

// Final output
union duration, totalProcessedConv

let orgIdFromDropDown = dynamic([{orgDropdown}]);
let channelFilter = dynamic([{channelDropdown}]); // Can be a parameter
let queueFilter = dynamic([{queueNameDropdown}]); // Can be a parameter

// Step 1: Parse traces once
let parsedTracesTable = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"]),
    parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| where orgId in (orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend  
    channel = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.StreamSource),
        isnotnull(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]), tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]),
        ""),
    queueId = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId),
        "")
| where isnotempty(conversationId) and isnotnull(orgId);

// Step 2: Extract channel from ConversationCreated traces
let conversationCreatedChannels = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| extend createdChannel = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"])
| where createdChannel in (channelFilter)
| project conversationId;
// Step 3: Get queueId from latest CSRAssignment
let csrAssignmentQueue = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "CSRAssignment"
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend queueIdTracesParsed = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdTracesParsed) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdTracesParsed;
// Step 4: Get queueId from latest RouteToQueue or RTQ (exclude TransferToQueue)
let routeToQueueEvents = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue")
| extend 
    rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend
     resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
 | extend   queueIdRTQ = tostring(resultJson.Id)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdRTQ) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdRTQ;
// Step 5: Combine queueId sources, preferring CSRAssignment
let finalQueueIds = csrAssignmentQueue
| union (routeToQueueEvents
         | where conversationId !in (csrAssignmentQueue));
// Step 6: Filter conversations based on channel and queue filters
let filteredConversations = finalQueueIds
| where conversationId in (conversationCreatedChannels)
| where queueId in (queueFilter)
| project conversationId;

let filteredTraces = parsedTracesTable
| where conversationId in (filteredConversations);

let tracesParsed = filteredTraces
| summarize by timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, tostring(customDimensions)
| project timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, customDim = parse_json(customDimensions);

// Step 2: Get ConversationCreated timestamp
let ConversationCreateds = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| summarize ConversationCreatedTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;

// Step 3: Get bot escalation timestamp
let botEscalationToHuman = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CopilotAgentEscalationToCSR"
| summarize botEscalateToHumanTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;

// Step 4: Get first CSRAccepted with "request completed"
let firstCSRAccepted = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CSRAccepted"
| where tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"]) contains "request completed"
| summarize firstCSRAcceptedTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;

// Step 5: Join all and calculate duration
let durations = ConversationCreateds
| join kind = leftouter (botEscalationToHuman) on conversationId
| join kind = inner (firstCSRAccepted) on conversationId
| extend assignmentDurationStart = iff(isnotempty(botEscalateToHumanTime), botEscalateToHumanTime, ConversationCreatedTime)
| where firstCSRAcceptedTime > assignmentDurationStart
| extend durationSeconds = tolong((firstCSRAcceptedTime - assignmentDurationStart) / 1s)
| extend durationMinutes = durationSeconds / 60.0
| extend durationBucket = case(
    durationMinutes < 5, "< 5 mins",
    durationMinutes >= 5 and durationMinutes <= 10, "5â€“10 mins",
    durationMinutes > 10, "> 10 mins",
    "other"
);

// Step 6: Aggregate
let total = durations
| summarize total = count()
| extend key = 1;

durations
| summarize count = count() by durationBucket
| extend key = 1
| join kind=inner total on key
| extend percentage = round(100.0 * count / total, 2)
| project durationBucket, count, percentage
| order by durationBucket

let orgIdFromDropDown = dynamic([{orgDropdown}]);
let channelFilter = dynamic([{channelDropdown}]); // Can be a parameter

// Step 1: Parse traces once

        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId),
        "")
| where isnotempty(conversationId) and isnotnull(orgId);

// Step 2: Extract channel from ConversationCreated traces
let conversationCreatedChannels = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| extend createdChannel = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"])
| where createdChannel in (channelFilter)
| project conversationId;
// Step 3: Get queueId from latest CSRAssignment
let csrAssignmentQueue = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "CSRAssignment"
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend queueIdTracesParsed = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdTracesParsed) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdTracesParsed;
// Step 4: Get queueId from latest RouteToQueue or RTQ (exclude TransferToQueue)
let routeToQueueEvents = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue")
| extend 
    rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend
     resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
 | extend   queueIdRTQ = tostring(resultJson.Id)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdRTQ) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdRTQ;
// Step 5: Combine queueId sources, preferring CSRAssignment
let finalQueueIds = csrAssignmentQueue
| union (routeToQueueEvents
         | where conversationId !in (csrAssignmentQueue));
// Step 6: Filter conversations based on channel and queue filters
let filteredConversations = finalQueueIds
| where conversationId in (conversationCreatedChannels)
| where queueId in (queueFilter)
| project conversationId;

let filteredTraces = parsedTracesTable
| where conversationId in (filteredConversations);

let assignmentSubscenarios = dynamic([
    "CSRAssignment", 
    "CSRAssignment", 
    "ManualAssignment", 
    "TransferAssignment", 
    "CSRAssignment"
]);

// Step 1: Parse and count Time to assign per conversation
let attempts = filteredTraces
| where  subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios)
| summarize attemptCount = count() by conversationId
| extend attemptCategory = case(
    attemptCount < 5, "Took <5 for the conversation",
    attemptCount >= 5 and attemptCount <= 10, "Took between 5-10 for the conversation",
    "Took >10 for the conversation"
);

// Step 2: Get total count
let total = attempts
| summarize total = count()
| extend key = 1;

// Step 3: Get count per bucket and join with total to calculate %
attempts
| summarize conversations = count() by attemptCategory
| extend key = 1
| join kind=inner total on key
| extend percentage = round(100.0 * conversations / total, 2)
| project attemptCategory, conversations, percentage
| order by attemptCategory
| render piechart

content.query:
let _screen = "{screen}";
let orgIdFromDropDown = dynamic([{orgDropdown}]);
let channelFilter = dynamic([{channelDropdown}]); 
let queueFilter = dynamic([{queueNameDropdown}]); 
let assignmentEventsFilter = dynamic([{assignmentEvents}]);
let conversationStateFilter = dynamic([{conversationState}]);
let timeToAssignFilter = dynamic([{timeToAssign}]);

// Step 1: Parse traces once
let parsedTracesTable = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"]),
    parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| where orgId in (orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend  
    channel = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.StreamSource),
        isnotnull(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]), tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]),
        ""),
    queueId = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId),
        "")
| where isnotempty(conversationId) and isnotnull(orgId);

let filteredConversations = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "CSRAssignment"
| where channel in (channelFilter) and queueId in (queueFilter)
| distinct conversationId;

let filteredTraces = parsedTracesTable
| where conversationId in (filteredConversations);

let assignmentSubscenarios = dynamic(["CSRAssignment", "ManualAssignment", "TransferAssignment"]);

let tracesParsed = filteredTraces
| summarize by timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, tostring(customDimensions), orgId
| project timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, customDim=parse_json(customDimensions), orgId;

// --- New: Get all conversations with ConversationClosed
let closedConversations = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "ConversationClosed"
| summarize by conversationId;

let ConversationCreateds = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| summarize ConversationCreatedTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId, orgId;

let botEscalationToHuman = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CopilotAgentEscalationToCSR"
| summarize botEscalateToHumanTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;

let firstCSRAccepted = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CSRAccepted"
| where tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"]) contains "request completed"
| summarize firstCSRAcceptedTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;

let queues = tracesParsed
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue", "TransferToQueue")
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by conversationId
| extend rawDescription = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"])
| extend rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
| extend queueId = case(
    subscenario == "TransferToQueue", extract(@"QueueId: ([0-9a-fA-F-]{36})", 1, rawDescription),
    subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue"), tostring(resultJson.Id),
    ""),
    queueName = case(
    subscenario == "TransferToQueue", extract(@"Target Queue: (.+?) with QueueId", 1, rawDescription),
    subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue"), tostring(resultJson.DisplayName),
    "")
| summarize by queueId, queueName, conversationId;

let recentQueueIdForConversation = tracesParsed
| where subscenario in ("CSRAssignment")
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend queueIdTracesParsed = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdTracesParsed) by conversationId;

let assignmentStats = tracesParsed
| where subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios)
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend wokstreamId = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.WorkStreamId)
| summarize assignmentCount = count(), initiated = min(timestamp), wokstreamId = any(wokstreamId) by conversationId;

// --- Updated conversation state block
let conversationStateRaw = tracesParsed
| extend type = customDim["type"]
| extend currentState = customDim["omnichannel.new_state"]
| extend previousState = customDim["omnichannel.previous_state"]
| where type == "C1ActionsDiagnosticsEvent"
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by conversationId
| project conversationId, currentState, previousState;

let conversationState = conversationStateRaw
| extend currentState = iff(conversationId in (closedConversations), "Closed", currentState);

ConversationCreateds
| join kind = leftouter (botEscalationToHuman) on conversationId
| join kind = leftouter (firstCSRAccepted) on conversationId
| join kind = leftouter (queues) on conversationId
| extend assignmentDurationStart = iff(isnotempty(botEscalateToHumanTime), botEscalateToHumanTime, ConversationCreatedTime)
| project conversationId, queueId, ConversationCreatedTime, botEscalateToHumanTime, assignmentDurationStart, firstCSRAcceptedTime, orgId
| join kind=leftouter (assignmentStats) on conversationId
| join kind=leftouter (recentQueueIdForConversation) on conversationId
| extend finalQueueId = iff(isnotempty(queueIdTracesParsed), queueIdTracesParsed, queueId)
| join kind = leftouter (queues) on $left.finalQueueId == $right.queueId and $left.conversationId == $right.conversationId
| extend duration = tolong((firstCSRAcceptedTime - assignmentDurationStart ) / 1s)
| join kind = leftouter (conversationState) on conversationId
| extend currentState = iff(isnotempty(currentState), currentState, "Open")
| extend jsonObject = pack("conversationId", conversationId, "queue", queueName, "previousScreen", _screen, "assignmentDuration", duration, "currentState", currentState, "orgIdFromDropDown", orgId, "queueId", finalQueueId)
| extend modifiedAssignmentCount = iff(assignmentCount > 5, "more than 5", tostring(assignmentCount))
| extend modifiedDuration = case(
        duration < 5*60, "< 5 mins",
        duration >= 5*60 and duration <= 10*60, "5â€“10 mins",
        duration > 10*60, "> 10 mins",
        "Never got assigned"
    )
| where modifiedAssignmentCount in (assignmentEventsFilter)
| where currentState in (conversationStateFilter)
| where modifiedDuration in (timeToAssignFilter)
| project 
    Conversation = conversationId,
    state = currentState,
    ["Time to assign"] = duration,
    ["Assignment events"] = assignmentCount,
    ["Initiated (UTC)"] = initiated,
    Queue = iff(isnotempty(queueName), queueName, finalQueueId),
    Workstream = wokstreamId,
    jsonObjectString = tostring(jsonObject)
| sort by ["Initiated (UTC)"] desc;

let _screen = "{screen}";
let orgIdFromDropDown = dynamic([{orgDropdown}]);
let channelFilter = dynamic([{channelDropdown}]); 
let queueFilter = dynamic([{queueNameDropdown}]); 
let assignmentEventsFilter = dynamic([{assignmentEvents}]);
let conversationStateFilter = dynamic([{conversationState}]);
let timeToAssignFilter = dynamic([{timeToAssign}]);

// Step 1: Parse traces once
let parsedTracesTable = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"]),
    parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| where orgId in (orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend  
    channel = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.StreamSource),
        isnotnull(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]), tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"]),
        ""),
    queueId = case(
        isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId),
        "")
| where isnotempty(conversationId) and isnotnull(orgId);

// Step 2: Extract channel from ConversationCreated traces
let conversationCreatedChannels = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| extend createdChannel = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"])
| where createdChannel in (channelFilter)
| project conversationId;
// Step 3: Get queueId from latest CSRAssignment
let csrAssignmentQueue = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario == "CSRAssignment"
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend queueIdTracesParsed = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdTracesParsed) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdTracesParsed;
// Step 4: Get queueId from latest RouteToQueue or RTQ (exclude TransferToQueue)
let routeToQueueEvents = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue")
| extend 
    rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend
     resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
 | extend   queueIdRTQ = tostring(resultJson.Id)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdRTQ) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueId = queueIdRTQ;
// Step 5: Combine queueId sources, preferring CSRAssignment
let finalQueueIds = csrAssignmentQueue
| union (routeToQueueEvents
         | where conversationId !in (csrAssignmentQueue));
// Step 6: Filter conversations based on channel and queue filters
let filteredConversations = finalQueueIds
| where conversationId in (conversationCreatedChannels)
| where queueId in (queueFilter)
| project conversationId;

let filteredTraces = parsedTracesTable
| where conversationId in (filteredConversations);

let assignmentSubscenarios = dynamic(["CSRAssignment", "ManualAssignment", "TransferAssignment"]);

let tracesParsed = filteredTraces
| summarize by timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, tostring(customDimensions), orgId
| project timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, customDim=parse_json(customDimensions), orgId;

// --- Get all conversations with ConversationClosed
let closedConversations = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "ConversationClosed"
| summarize by conversationId;
let ConversationCreateds = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| extend recordId = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.record.id"])
| summarize ConversationCreatedTime = min(timestamp)  by conversationId, recordId, orgId;
let botEscalationToHuman = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CopilotAgentEscalationToCSR"
| summarize botEscalateToHumanTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;
let firstCSRAccepted = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CSRAccepted"
| where tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"]) contains "request completed"
| summarize firstCSRAcceptedTime = min(timestamp) by conversationId;

// --- Get queueName from routing events
let queues = tracesParsed
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue", "TransferToQueue")
| extend rawDescription = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"])
| extend rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
| extend queueId = case(
    subscenario == "TransferToQueue", extract(@"QueueId: ([0-9a-fA-F-]{36})", 1, rawDescription),
    subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue"), tostring(resultJson.Id),
    "")
| extend queueName = case(
    subscenario == "TransferToQueue", extract(@"Target Queue: (.+?) with QueueId", 1, rawDescription),
    subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue"), tostring(resultJson.DisplayName),
    "")
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueName) by queueId;

// --- Get most recent queueId from CSRAssignment
let csrAssignmentQueue1  = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CSRAssignment"
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend queueIdTracesParsed = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdTracesParsed) by conversationId;

// Step 4: Get queueId from latest RouteToQueue or RTQ (exclude TransferToQueue)
let routeToQueueEvents1 = parsedTracesTable
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue")
| extend 
    rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend
     resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
 | extend   queueIdRTQ = tostring(resultJson.Id)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueIdRTQ) by conversationId
| project conversationId, queueIdTracesParsed = queueIdRTQ;
// Step 5: Combine queueId sources, preferring CSRAssignment
let recentQueueIdForConversation = csrAssignmentQueue1
| union (routeToQueueEvents1
         | where conversationId !in (csrAssignmentQueue1));
         
// --- Assignment stats
let assignmentStats = tracesParsed
| where subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios)
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend wokstreamId = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.WorkStreamId)
| summarize assignmentCount = count(), initiated = min(timestamp), wokstreamId = any(wokstreamId) by conversationId;
// --- Conversation state
let conversationStateRaw = tracesParsed
| extend type = customDim["type"]
| extend currentState = customDim["omnichannel.new_state"]
| extend previousState = customDim["omnichannel.previous_state"]
| where type == "C1ActionsDiagnosticsEvent"
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by conversationId
| project conversationId, currentState, previousState;
let conversationState = conversationStateRaw
| extend currentState = iff(conversationId in (closedConversations), "Closed", currentState);
// --- Final output
ConversationCreateds
| join kind = leftouter (botEscalationToHuman) on conversationId
| join kind = leftouter (firstCSRAccepted) on conversationId
| extend assignmentDurationStart = iff(isnotempty(botEscalateToHumanTime), botEscalateToHumanTime, ConversationCreatedTime)
| project conversationId, ConversationCreatedTime, botEscalateToHumanTime, assignmentDurationStart, firstCSRAcceptedTime, orgId, recordId
| join kind=leftouter (assignmentStats) on conversationId
| join kind=leftouter (recentQueueIdForConversation) on conversationId
| extend finalQueueId = queueIdTracesParsed
| join kind = leftouter (queues) on $left.finalQueueId == $right.queueId
| extend duration = tolong((firstCSRAcceptedTime - assignmentDurationStart ) / 1s)
| join kind = leftouter (conversationState) on conversationId
| extend currentState = iff(isnotempty(currentState), currentState, "Open")
| extend jsonObject = pack("conversationId", conversationId, "queue", coalesce(queueName, finalQueueId), "previousScreen", _screen, "assignmentDuration", duration, "currentState", currentState, "orgIdFromDropDown", orgId, "recordId", recordId)
| extend modifiedAssignmentCount = iff(isnull(assignmentCount), "0", iff(assignmentCount > 5, "more than 5", tostring(assignmentCount)))
| extend modifiedDuration = case(
        duration < 5*60, "< 5 mins",
        duration >= 5*60 and duration <= 10*60, "5â€“10 mins",
        duration > 10*60, "> 10 mins",
        "Never got assigned"
    )
| where modifiedAssignmentCount in (assignmentEventsFilter)
| where currentState in (conversationStateFilter)
| where modifiedDuration in (timeToAssignFilter)
| project 
    Conversation = conversationId,
    Record = recordId,
    state = currentState,
    ["Time to assign"] = duration,
    ["Assignment events"] = assignmentCount,
    ["Initiated (UTC)"] = coalesce(tostring(initiated), "N/A"),
    Queue = coalesce(queueName, finalQueueId),
    Workstream = wokstreamId,
    jsonObjectString = tostring(jsonObject) 
| sort by ["Initiated (UTC)"] desc;

parameters.name: jsonQueryOutputConversation
parameters.query:
let raw = dynamic({jsonObject});
let _conversationId = raw.conversationId;
let orgIdFromDropDown = raw.orgIdFromDropDown;

// Parse all traces
let tracesParsed = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"]),
    timestamp = timestamp
| where orgId in (orgIdFromDropDown)
| where conversationId == _conversationId;

// Get channel from ConversationCreated
let channelFromConversationCreated = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated"
| extend channel = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.channel.type"])
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, channel) by conversationId;

// Get queueId and other fields from CSRAssignment
let csrAssignmentData = tracesParsed
| where subscenario == "CSRAssignment"
| extend parsedWorkItemDetails = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.work_item.details"]))
| extend queueId = tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.QueueId)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueId, customDim, parsedWorkItemDetails) by conversationId
| extend 
    assignmentMethod =  iff(isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails),  parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.assignment.method"])), ""),
    workstream = iff(isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.WorkStreamId), ""),
    requiredCapacityUnit = iff(isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.RequiredCapacityUnits), ""),
    allowedPresence = iff(isnotnull(parsedWorkItemDetails), tostring(parsedWorkItemDetails.AllowedPresences), ""),
    unformattedTimestamp = tostring(timestamp),
    initiated = tostring(format_datetime(timestamp, 'M/d/yyyy, h:mm:ss.fff tt'))
| project conversationId, queueId, assignmentMethod, workstream, requiredCapacityUnit, allowedPresence, unformattedTimestamp, initiated;

// Get queueId from RouteToQueue or RTQ if CSRAssignment is missing
let routeToQueueData = tracesParsed
| where subscenario in ("RTQ", "RouteToQueue")
| extend rawResult = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.result"])
| extend resultJson = parse_json(rawResult)
| extend queueId = tostring(resultJson.Id)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, queueId) by conversationId
| where conversationId !in (csrAssignmentData)
| extend 
    assignmentMethod = "",
    workstream = "",
    requiredCapacityUnit = "",
    allowedPresence = "",
    unformattedTimestamp = "",
    initiated = "";

// Combine queue sources
let finalQueueData = csrAssignmentData
| union routeToQueueData;

// Join with channel
finalQueueData
| join kind=inner (channelFromConversationCreated) on conversationId
| extend json = pack(
    "conversationId", conversationId,
    "channel", channel,
    "assignmentMethod", assignmentMethod,
    "workstream", workstream,
    "requiredCapacityUnit", requiredCapacityUnit,
    "initiated", initiated,
    "allowedPresence", allowedPresence,
    "unformattedTimestamp", unformattedTimestamp
)
| project json

  • ", tostring(reqSkill), "
    • ") | summarize htmlList = strcat_array(make_list(htmlItem), "") | project htmlList = strcat("
      ",coalesce(htmlList, "No skills available"), "
    ")

let raw = dynamic({jsonQueryOutputConversation});
let _conversationId = tostring(raw.conversationId);
let _screen = '{screen}';
let _jsonObject = dynamic({jsonObject});
let agentNameJson = dynamic({agentNameJson});
let inputTimestamp = todatetime(raw.unformattedTimestamp); 
let assignmentSubscenarios = dynamic(["CSRAssignment", "CSRAssignment", "ManualAssignment", "TransferAssignment", "CSRAssignment","SupervisorInitiatedTransfer"]);
let c1ActionSubscenario = dynamic(["CSRAccepted","CSRRejected","CSRNotificationTimeout"]);
let tracesParsed = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where orgId in (parse_json(_jsonObject).orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend 
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"])
| where isnotempty(conversationId) and isnotnull(conversationId)
| where conversationId == _conversationId
| summarize by timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, tostring(customDimensions)
| project timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, customDim=parse_json(customDimensions)
;

let mainTable = tracesParsed
| extend type = tostring(customDim["type"])
| where type in ("AssignmentURDiagnosticsEvent", "C1ActionsDiagnosticsEvent","AssignmentManualDiagnosticsEvent")
| where subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios) or subscenario in (c1ActionSubscenario)
| extend parsedAssignmentStatus = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.assignment.status"]))
| extend isAgentAssigned = tostring(parsedAssignmentStatus.IsAgentAssigned)
| extend capacityProfiles = tostring(parsedAssignmentStatus.AgentDetails.CapacityProfiles)
| extend agentId = case(
    isAgentAssigned == "true", tostring(parsedAssignmentStatus.AgentDetails.AgentId),
    tostring(customDim["omnichannel.target_agent.id"])
)
| extend description = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"])
| extend result = case(
    (subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios) and isAgentAssigned == "false"), "No eligible CSR found",
    ""
)
| extend reason = case(
    (subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios) and isAgentAssigned == "true"), "CSR assigned",
    (subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios) and isAgentAssigned == "false"), tostring(parsedAssignmentStatus.Reason),
    isnotnull(description) or isnotempty(description), description,
    ""
)
| sort by timestamp asc
| extend prevScreenParams = tostring(_jsonObject)
| extend jsonObject = tostring(pack("timestamp", timestamp,"conversationId",conversationId,"agentId", agentId, "previousScreen", _screen, "currentState", _jsonObject.currentState, "queue", _jsonObject.queue,"orgIdFromDropDown", _jsonObject.orgIdFromDropDown, "recordId", _jsonObject.recordId))
| extend CSR = case(
    isnotempty(agentId), agentId,
    "No eligible CSR found"
)
| extend screen = case(
    isnotempty(agentId), "csrdetails",
    "assignmenteventdetails"
)
| project 
  Timestamp = timestamp, 
  ["Sub-scenario"] = case(
    subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios), subscenario,
    subscenario
), 
  Result = reason,
  CSR, 
  customDim,
  jsonObject,
  prevScreenParams,
  screen;

let agentConfiguration = mainTable | where CSR !contains ("No eligible CSR found") | project Timestamp, CSR
| join kind = leftouter (
    traces
    | extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
    | extend agentId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"])
    | extend subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"])
    | where subscenario == "AgentConfiguration" or subscenario == 'CSRConfigurationDetails'
    | extend agentProfiles = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.capacity_profile.ids"])
    | mv-expand profileIds = parse_json(agentProfiles)
    | project agentConfigRecordedTime = timestamp, profileIds, agentProfiles, agentId, subscenario, agentConfig = customDim
    | order by agentConfigRecordedTime desc 
) on $left.CSR == $right.agentId
| where agentConfigRecordedTime <= Timestamp;

let capacityprofiles1 = agentConfiguration
| mv-expand profileIds = parse_json(agentProfiles)
| project profileIds;

let capacityProfileEvents = mainTable | where CSR !contains ("No eligible CSR found") | project Timestamp, CSR
| join kind = leftouter (
    traces
    | extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
    | extend orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
    | where orgId in (_jsonObject.orgIdFromDropDown) 
    | extend agentId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]) 
    | extend subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"])
    | where subscenario == "CSRStatusandCapacityDetails"
    | extend capacityProfileStr = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.capacity_profile"])
    | extend capacityProfileJson = parse_json(capacityProfileStr)
    | extend capacityProfileId = tostring(capacityProfileJson["CapacityProfileId"])
    | extend cavailableCapacityUnits = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.available_capacity.units"])
    | extend cpresence = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.current_base_presence"])
    | where capacityProfileId in (capacityprofiles1) 
    | project capacityProfileTimestamp = timestamp, capacityProfile = capacityProfileStr, agentId, capacityProfileId
) on $left.CSR == $right.agentId
| where capacityProfileTimestamp > Timestamp
| summarize arg_min(capacityProfileTimestamp, *) by Timestamp, capacityProfileId
| summarize beforeCapacityProfiles = make_list(parse_json(capacityProfile)) by Timestamp;

//capacityProfileEvents;

let withCapacity = mainTable
| join kind = leftouter (
    traces
    | where timestamp between ((inputTimestamp - 1d) .. inputTimestamp + 1d)
    | extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions) 
    | extend orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
    | where orgId in (parse_json(_jsonObject).orgIdFromDropDown)
    | extend agentId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]) 
    | extend subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"])
    | extend availableCapacityUnits = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.available_capacity.units"])
    | extend presence = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.current_base_presence"]) 
    | where subscenario == "CSRStatusandCapacityDetails"
    | project statusCapacityHistoryRecordedTime = timestamp, agentId, presence, availableCapacityUnits
) on $left.CSR == $right.agentId
| where statusCapacityHistoryRecordedTime >= Timestamp and statusCapacityHistoryRecordedTime <= Timestamp + 1h or isnull(statusCapacityHistoryRecordedTime)
| summarize arg_min(statusCapacityHistoryRecordedTime, *) by Timestamp
| join kind = leftouter (capacityProfileEvents) on Timestamp
| extend agentName = iif(CSR != "No eligible CSR found" and isnotempty(agentNameJson[CSR]), agentNameJson[CSR], CSR)
| project Timestamp,
  ["Sub-scenario"],
  Result,
  CSR = agentName,
  customDim,
  jsonObject,
  prevScreenParams,
  screen,
  Presence = coalesce(presence, "No data"),
  ["Available capacity"] = coalesce(availableCapacityUnits, "No data"),
  ["Capacity profile"] = coalesce(beforeCapacityProfiles, "No capacity profile found")
;
withCapacity
| sort by Timestamp asc;

let raw = dynamic({jsonQueryOutputConversation}); let rawObject = dynamic({jsonObject}); let recordTypeRaw = dynamic({recordtypejsonraw}); datatable(dummy:int)[1] | extend conversationId = coalesce(tostring(raw.conversationId),"--"), timestamp = coalesce(tostring(format_datetime(todatetime(rawObject.timestamp), 'M/d/yyyy, h:mm:ss.fff tt')),"--"), state = coalesce(tostring(rawObject.currentState),"Open"), channel = coalesce(tostring(raw.channel),"--"), workstream = coalesce(tostring(raw.workstream),"--"), requiredCapacityUnit = coalesce(tostring(raw.requiredCapacityUnit),"--"), queue = coalesce(tostring(rawObject.queue),"--"), allowedPresence = coalesce(tostring(raw.allowedPresence),"--"), assignmentMethod = coalesce(tostring(raw.assignmentMethod),"--"), recordId = coalesce(tostring(rawObject.recordId),"--"), recordType = coalesce(tostring(recordTypeRaw.entityLogicalName),"--") | extend html = strcat( '
', '
ConversationID : ', conversationId, '
', '
RecordId : ', recordId, '
', '
Record Type : ', recordType, '
', '
Timestamp (UTC) : ', timestamp, '
', '
State : ', state, '
', '
Channel : ', channel, '
', '
Workstream : ', workstream, '
', '
Required Capacity : ', requiredCapacityUnit, '
', '
Queue : ', queue, '
', '
Allowed presence : ', allowedPresence, '
', '
Assignment method : ', assignmentMethod, '
', '
' ) | project html

parameters.name: searchCSR
parameters.label: Search for CSR
parameters.description: Enter CSR Name or CSR ID

content.query:
// Parse the agentNameJson parameter (should be a single JSON object: id:name)
let agentNameJson = parse_json('{agentNameJson}');

// User provides a name to search
let searchCSR = '{searchCSR}'; // The agent name or ID to search for
let rawObject = dynamic({jsonObject});
let assignmentTime = todatetime(rawObject.timestamp);
let startWindow = assignmentTime - 10d;

// Find all agent IDs with the given name
let idNameMapping = 
    range dummy from 1 to 1 step 1
    | extend keys = bag_keys(agentNameJson)
    | mv-expand id = keys
    | extend id = tostring(id)
    | extend name = tostring(agentNameJson[tostring(id)])
    | where not(isempty(trim(' ', searchCSR))) and name contains searchCSR
    | project id;

// If no mapping found, use searchCSR as id
let agentIds = 
    union
    (
        idNameMapping
    ),
    (
        // Only use searchCSR if idNameMapping is empty
        idNameMapping
        | summarize count() 
        | where count_ == 0
        | project id = searchCSR
    )
    | where isnotempty(id)
    | summarize by id;

// CSRStatusandCapacityDetails: presence, unit capacity, capacity profile
let latestStatus = traces
| where timestamp between (startWindow .. assignmentTime)
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where orgId in (parse_json(rawObject).orgIdFromDropDown)
| where tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]) == "CSRStatusandCapacityDetails"
| extend thisAgentId = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.agent.id"])
| where thisAgentId in (agentIds)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by thisAgentId
| extend capacityProfileString = tostring((customDim["omnichannel.capacity_profile"]))
| extend capacityProfileJSON = parse_json(capacityProfileString)
| project 
    CSR = thisAgentId,
    Presence = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.current_base_presence"]),
    UnitCapacity = toint(customDim["omnichannel.available_capacity.units"]),
    CapacityProfile = tostring(capacityProfileJSON["CapacityProfileId"]),
    joinKey = 1;

// CSRConfigurationDetails: skills
let latestConfig = traces
| where timestamp between (startWindow .. assignmentTime)
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where orgId in (parse_json(rawObject).orgIdFromDropDown)
| where tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]) == "CSRConfigurationDetails"
| extend thisAgentId = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.agent.id"])
| where thisAgentId in (agentIds)
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by thisAgentId
| project 
    CSR = thisAgentId,
    Skills = customDim["omnichannel.associated_skills"],
    joinKey = 1;

// Join using dummy key, show all matches
latestStatus
| join kind=leftouter latestConfig on joinKey, CSR
| project CSR = iff(isnotempty(agentNameJson[CSR]), agentNameJson[CSR], CSR), Presence, ["Unit Capacity"] = UnitCapacity, ["Capacity Profile"] = CapacityProfile, Skills = coalesce(Skills, "--")

let rawObject = dynamic({jsonObject});
let _conversationId = tostring(rawObject.conversationId);
let tracesParsed = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"])
| where isnotempty(conversationId) and isnotnull(conversationId)
| where conversationId == _conversationId
| summarize by timestamp, conversationId, subscenario, tostring(customDimensions)
| sort by timestamp asc
| project Timestamp = timestamp, Event = subscenario, ["Custom Dimensions"]=parse_json(customDimensions), ["Conversation ID"] = conversationId
;

tracesParsed;

parameters.name: csrdetailsjsonraw
parameters.query:
//csrdetailsjsonraw
let raw = dynamic({jsonObject});
let agentId = tostring(raw.agentId); // Replace with actual agent ID
let inputTime = todatetime(raw.timestamp); // Replace with reference timestamp
let agentMapping = dynamic({agentNameJson}); // Agent ID to Name mapping JSON

// Create table with agentId and agentName with fallback
let agentNameTable = range x from 1 to 1 step 1
| extend agentId = agentId
| extend agentName = coalesce(tostring(agentMapping[agentId]), "Unknown Agent")
| project agentId, agentName;

let agentConfig = traces
| where timestamp between (inputTime - 10d .. inputTime)
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where orgId in (raw.orgIdFromDropDown)
| where tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]) == "CSRConfigurationDetails"
| where tostring(customDim["omnichannel.agent.id"]) == agentId
| top 1 by timestamp desc
| extend
    agentId = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.agent.id"]),
    MaxCapacityUnits = toint(customDim["omnichannel.max_capacity.units"])
| extend
    Skills = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.associated_skills"])),
    CapacityProfileIds = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.capacity_profile.ids"])),
    QueueIds = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.queue.ids"]))
| project agentId, Skills, CapacityProfileIds, MaxCapacityUnits, QueueIds;

// Join agentNameTable and agentConfig on agentId
agentNameTable
| join kind=leftouter agentConfig on agentId
| project agentId, agentName, Skills, CapacityProfileIds, MaxCapacityUnits, QueueIds
| extend agentJSON = bag_pack("agentName", agentName,
                              "agentId", agentId,
                              "agentskills", Skills,
                              "agentCapacityProfileIds", CapacityProfileIds,
                              "agentMaxCapacityUnits", MaxCapacityUnits,
                              "agentQueueIds", QueueIds)
| project agentJSON

content.query:
let raw = dynamic({csrdetailsjsonraw}); let agentIdNameMapping = dynamic({agentNameJson}); datatable(dummy:int)[1] | extend agentId = tostring(raw.agentId) | extend agentName = coalesce(agentIdNameMapping[agentId], agentId), agentMaxCapacityUnits = coalesce(tostring(raw.agentMaxCapacityUnits),"--") | extend html = strcat( '
', '
CSR name : ', agentName, '
', '
Maximum capacity unit : ', agentMaxCapacityUnits, '
', '
CSR ID : ', agentId, '
', '
' ) | project html

let assignmentSubscenarios = dynamic([
    "CSRAssignment",
    "ManualAssignment",
    "TransferAssignment",
    "SupervisorInitiatedTransfer"
]);
let c1ActionSubscenario = dynamic(["CSRAccepted","CSRRejected","CSRNotificationTimeout"]);

let raw = dynamic({csrdetailsjsonraw});
let rawObject = dynamic({jsonObject});
let inputAgentId = tostring(raw.agentId); // Replace with actual agent ID
let inputTimestamp = todatetime(rawObject.timestamp); // Replace with actual timestamp

let mainTable = traces
| where timestamp between ((inputTimestamp - 2h) .. inputTimestamp + 2h)
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where orgId in (parse_json(rawObject).orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    type = tostring(customDim["type"]),
    parsedAssignmentStatus = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.assignment.status"]))
| extend isAgentAssigned = tostring(parsedAssignmentStatus.IsAgentAssigned)
| extend agentId = case(
        isAgentAssigned == "true", tostring(parsedAssignmentStatus.AgentDetails.AgentId),
        tostring(customDim["omnichannel.target_agent.id"])
    )
| where isnotempty(agentId) and agentId == inputAgentId
| where type in ("AssignmentURDiagnosticsEvent", "C1ActionsDiagnosticsEvent", "AssignmentManualDiagnosticsEvent")
      and (subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios) or subscenario in (c1ActionSubscenario))
| extend description = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.description"])
| extend reason = case(
    (subscenario in (assignmentSubscenarios) and isAgentAssigned == "true"), "CSR assigned",
    isnotnull(description) or isnotempty(description), description,
    ""
)
| distinct Timestamp = timestamp, ["Conversation ID"] = conversationId, Action = subscenario, Result = reason
| sort by Timestamp asc;

let timestamps = mainTable | project Timestamp;

let timeRange = mainTable 
| summarize 
    minTime = min(Timestamp),
    maxTime = max(Timestamp);

let minTimestamp = toscalar(timeRange | project minTime);
let maxTimestamp = toscalar(timeRange | project maxTime);

let agentConfigs = traces
| where timestamp between ((inputTimestamp - 10d) .. maxTimestamp)
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend 
    orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where orgId in (rawObject.orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend agentid = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"])
| extend subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"])
| where subscenario == "AgentConfiguration" or subscenario == 'CSRConfigurationDetails'
| where agentid == inputAgentId
| extend agentProfiles = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.capacity_profile.ids"])
| mv-expand profileIds = parse_json(agentProfiles)
| project agentConfigRecordedTime = timestamp, profileIds, agentProfiles, agentid, subscenario, agentConfig = customDim
| order by agentConfigRecordedTime desc
| summarize arg_max(agentConfigRecordedTime, *) by agentid;

let capacityprofiles1 = agentConfigs
| mv-expand profileIds = parse_json(agentProfiles)
| project profileIds;

let statusEvents = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where orgId in (parse_json(rawObject).orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend agentId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"])
| extend subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"])
| extend availableCapacityUnits = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.available_capacity.units"])
| extend presence = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.current_base_presence"])
| where subscenario == "CSRStatusandCapacityDetails"
| where agentId == inputAgentId
| project timestamp, presence, availableCapacityUnits;

let capacityProfileEvents = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend orgId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.organization.id"])
| where orgId in (parse_json(rawObject).orgIdFromDropDown)
| extend agentId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"])
| extend subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"])
| where subscenario == "CSRStatusandCapacityDetails"
| extend capacityProfileStr = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.capacity_profile"])
| extend capacityProfileJson = parse_json(capacityProfileStr)
| extend capacityProfileId = tostring(capacityProfileJson["CapacityProfileId"])
| extend cavailableCapacityUnits = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.available_capacity.units"])
| extend cpresence = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.current_base_presence"])
| where agentId == inputAgentId
| where capacityProfileId in (capacityprofiles1)
| project capacityProfileTimestamp = timestamp, capacityProfile = capacityProfileStr, capacityProfileId;

// Get the latest capacity profile for each capacityProfileId BEFORE each timestamp
let beforeCapacityProfiles = timestamps
| extend dummy = 1
| join kind=inner (capacityProfileEvents | extend dummy = 1) on dummy
| where capacityProfileTimestamp <= Timestamp
| summarize arg_max(capacityProfileTimestamp, capacityProfile) by Timestamp, capacityProfileId
| summarize beforeCapacityProfiles = make_list(parse_json(capacityProfile)) by Timestamp;

// Get the earliest capacity profile for each capacityProfileId AFTER each timestamp
let afterCapacityProfiles = timestamps
| extend dummy = 1
| join kind=inner (capacityProfileEvents | extend dummy = 1) on dummy
| where capacityProfileTimestamp >= Timestamp // Changed from >= to > to exclude exact timestamp
| summarize arg_min(capacityProfileTimestamp, capacityProfile) by Timestamp, capacityProfileId
| summarize afterCapacityProfiles = make_list(parse_json(capacityProfile)) by Timestamp;

// Combine capacity profiles
let combinedCapacityProfiles = beforeCapacityProfiles
| join kind=fullouter (afterCapacityProfiles) on Timestamp
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(Timestamp, Timestamp1)
| project 
    Timestamp,
    beforeCapacityProfiles = coalesce(beforeCapacityProfiles, dynamic([])),
    afterCapacityProfiles = coalesce(afterCapacityProfiles, dynamic([]));

// Get presence and capacity units before and after each timestamp
let beforeAndAfterTable = timestamps
| extend dummy = 1
| join kind=inner (statusEvents | extend dummy = 1) on dummy
| where timestamp <= Timestamp
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, presence, availableCapacityUnits) by Timestamp
| join kind=inner (
    timestamps
    | extend dummy = 1
    | join kind=inner (statusEvents | extend dummy = 1) on dummy
    | where timestamp > Timestamp  // Changed from >= to > to exclude exact timestamp
    | summarize arg_min(timestamp, presence, availableCapacityUnits) by Timestamp
) on Timestamp
| project 
    Timestamp = Timestamp, 
    beforePresence = presence, 
    beforeCapacityUnit = availableCapacityUnits,
    afterPresence = presence1, 
    afterCapacityUnit = availableCapacityUnits1
| sort by Timestamp asc;

// Final combined result
mainTable
| join kind=leftouter (beforeAndAfterTable) on Timestamp
| join kind=leftouter (combinedCapacityProfiles) on Timestamp
| project 
    Timestamp,
    ["Conversation ID"] = coalesce(["Conversation ID"], "--"),
    Action = coalesce(Action, "--"),
    Result = coalesce(Result, "--"),
    beforePresence = coalesce(beforePresence, "--"),
    afterPresence = coalesce(afterPresence, "--"),
    beforeCapacityUnit = coalesce(beforeCapacityUnit, "--"),
    afterCapacityUnit = coalesce(afterCapacityUnit, "--"),
    beforeCapacityProfiles = coalesce(beforeCapacityProfiles, dynamic([])),
    afterCapacityProfiles = coalesce(afterCapacityProfiles, dynamic([]))
| sort by Timestamp asc;

let raw = dynamic({jsonQueryOutputConversation}); let rawObject = dynamic({jsonObject}); let inputRecordId = tostring(rawObject.recordId); let intakeInfo = traces | extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions) | extend subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]), recordId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]), additionalInfo = parse_json(tostring(customDim["omnichannel.additional_info"])) | where recordId == inputRecordId | where subscenario == "Intake" | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by recordId | summarize RoutedOn = max(timestamp) by RecordId = recordId, RecordType = tostring(additionalInfo.entitylogicalname); datatable(dummy:int)[1] | extend RecordId = coalesce(tostring(rawObject.recordId), "--") | join kind=leftouter intakeInfo on RecordId | extend RoutedOnStr = coalesce(tostring(format_datetime(RoutedOn, 'M/d/yyyy, h:mm:ss.fff tt')), "--") | extend html = strcat( '
', '
Record ID : ', RecordId, '
', '
Routed On (UTC) : ', RoutedOnStr, '
', '
Record Type : ', RecordType, '
', '
' ) | project html

let rawObject = dynamic({jsonObject});
let inputRecordId = tostring(rawObject.recordId);

// Step 1: Get all ConversationCreated events with recordId
let createdEvents = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    recordId = tostring(customDim["omnichannel.record.id"]),
    createdTime = timestamp
| where subscenario == "ConversationCreated" and recordId == inputRecordId
| distinct  timestamp, conversationId, recordId, createdTime
| sort by createdTime asc
| serialize
| extend idx = row_number()
| extend prevCreatedTime = iff(idx == 1, datetime(null), prev(createdTime));


// Step 2: Get all events that have same recordId
let recordEvents  = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend
    recordId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    eventTimestamp = timestamp
| where recordId == inputRecordId
| distinct recordId, subscenario, eventTimestamp;

// Step 3: Tag those recordId events to the right conversation window
let recordTimeline = createdEvents
| join kind=inner (
    recordEvents
) on recordId
| where 
    (isnull(prevCreatedTime) and eventTimestamp < createdTime)
    or (eventTimestamp >= prevCreatedTime and eventTimestamp < createdTime)
| extend conversationLabel = strcat("ConversationId: ", conversationId)
| project conversationLabel, subscenario, eventTimestamp, createdTime, recordId, conversationId;

// Step 4: Now get all events for those conversationIds
let conversationEvents = traces
| extend customDim = parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend
    conversationId = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.resource.id"]),
    subscenario = tostring(customDim["powerplatform.analytics.subscenario"]),
    eventTimestamp = timestamp
| where conversationId in (createdEvents | project conversationId)
| extend conversationLabel = strcat("ConversationId: ", conversationId)
| project conversationId, conversationLabel, eventTimestamp, subscenario, source = "Conversation Event";

//join allConversationEvents and conversationAdnRecordEvent to 
// Step 5: Union both and sort
recordTimeline
| union conversationEvents
| extend Timestamp = coalesce(tostring(format_datetime(eventTimestamp, 'M/d/yyyy, h:mm:ss.fff tt')), "--")
| distinct conversationLabel, subscenario, Timestamp
| sort by conversationLabel asc, Timestamp asc
